ai-tika-vin09t6:1_0: The first training rule on what is intended
ai-tika-vin09t6:2_0: he preserves the reason for which there is an act of wrong conduct for the purpose of food,
ai-tika-vin09t6:2_1: For the one in material delights in material things by the one who remains (of the next life) in the same way as the other;
ai-tika-vin09t6:3_0: The first training rule on acknowledgment is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t6:4_0: The second training rule on what is intended for herself
ai-tika-vin09t6:5_0: “One who has produced in the robe-making season for one like me is performing a demonstration of action.”
ai-tika-vin09t6:6_0: The second training rule on acknowledgment is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t6:7_0: The training rule on what is intended for herself
ai-tika-vin09t6:8_0: after receiving it from a monastery or on the vicinity of a monastery or on the vicinity of the monastery, he preparing the vicinity of a monastery or on the ground in the vicinity of a monastery or in the monastery. He needs them, is the meaning.
ai-tika-vin09t6:9_0: If he receives the food outside the monastery while eating, there is no offense.
ai-tika-vin09t6:9_1: And in the monastery, thinking, “In the midst of the Sangha,” “They should be received.”
ai-tika-vin09t6:9_2: if it is shown where there is a danger to give, saying when it is present;
ai-tika-vin09t6:9_3: “One who has produced in the robe-making season for one like me is performing a demonstration of action.”
ai-tika-vin09t6:10_0: The fourth training rule on acknowledgment is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t6:11_0: The commentary on the offenses entailing acknowledgment is finished.
